P005776.project_name: Ibb and Dhamar Water Supply and Sewerage Project

project_abstract.cdata: The project seeks to adequately provide a basic need--potable water--as well as effective sewerage for the people of the cities of Ibb and Dhamar, two of five main urban centers of YAR, and to provide key assistance to further develop the institutional and operational capability of NWSA. The project consists of: (a) provision of water supply and pipe sewerage systems for Ibb (for the projected 1990 population of 63,000), and for Dhamar (for the projected 1990 population of 70,000); (b) technical assistance to strengthen the operational, technical and financial capability of NWSA; and (c) training of NWSA staff.
